attributes.action: Give free first aid or choking classes to parents
attributes.additional_details: People online, and people in the streets have told me they would sign to receive a free course in first aid. It could save so many babies. I didn't know what to do when my son started to choke. I think this course would help loads of mums and dads. It could even help save paramedics coming out if mums and dad knew what to do.
attributes.background: I would like to start this petition for mums and dad to receive free classes for first aid/choking classes Today my 10month old son started to choke he stopped breathing and I didn't know what to do I have wanted to do a first aid course but it costs money and people like myself Can't afford it
